content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mister Wang, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you will find my apartment to be a perfect fit for your needs. How much were you thinking of offering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am very interested in your apartment, especially since it is located in the city center and close to all important facilities. However, I am a student and my budget is limited. I am looking for a place that is both affordable and comfortable. Could you please tell me what the lowest rent you would consider is?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I am always looking to get the best return on my investment. However, I understand that as a student, you may have a tighter budget. Let's negotiate a fair price that works for both of us. What is the highest rent you would be willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your understanding. As a student, I am looking to spend no more than 700 Euros per month on rent, including all utilities. This is the maximum I can afford while still maintaining a decent living standard. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 700 Euros per month, including utilities, is a very reasonable offer for a student. However, considering the prime location and the quality of the apartment, I was hoping for a higher rent. Could we perhaps find a middle ground? How about 850 Euros per month, all inclusive? This would still be a great deal for you, considering the conveniences and amenities the apartment offers.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of 850 Euros per month, all inclusive, is certainly a step in the right direction. However, it still exceeds my budget. I am willing to pay a maximum of 750 Euros per month, including all utilities, which I believe is a fair price for both parties. This would allow me to live comfortably without straining my financial situation as a student. Would you consider this offer?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your offer of 750 Euros per month, all inclusive, is certainly more in line with what I was hoping for. However, after considering the exceptional location and the modern amenities of the apartment, I believe 800 Euros per month, all inclusive, would be a fair and mutually beneficial agreement. This would ensure that you have a comfortable living space while providing me with an acceptable return on my investment. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your counter-offer of 800 Euros per month, all inclusive, is quite compelling. The location and amenities of the apartment are indeed exceptional. I appreciate your willingness to work with me on a price that is more in line with my budget as a student. I would like to propose a compromise: 775 Euros per month, all inclusive. This would be my absolute maximum, and I believe it would be a fair deal for both of us. What is your final decision on this offer?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your offer of 775 Euros per month, all inclusive, is a very generous one, and I am willing to accept it. You have negotiated a fair price that takes into account both the quality of the apartment and your budget as a student. I am pleased to have reached an agreement with you. TERMINATE
